document.masterDocTitle: Rediscovery of Calymmochilus russoi Gibson, 1995 (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Eupelmidae), and revision of European Calymmochilus Masi, 1919

(2004) Further observations on Eupelminae (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Eupelmidae) in the Iberian Peninsula and Canary Islands, including descriptions of new species. Graellsia, 60 (1), 27 - 39. https: // doi. org / 10.3989 / graellsia. 2004. v 60. i 1.191

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Calymmochilus delphinus Askew in
Askew & Nieves-Aldrey 2004 : 32
, 35, 36. Holotype ♀ , MNCN, re-examined by LF. Type locality: Spain , Granada , Calahonda.
Calymmochilus delphinus
;
Askew & Nieves-Aldrey 2017 : 10
(distribution).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution . Previously known only from continental Spain ( Askew & Nieves-Aldrey 2004 ). Here newly recorded for the Canary Islands , France and Greece . Reported by Askew and Nieves-Aldrey (2017) from Canary Islands based on the record in this paper.

Material examined . Type material .

, L. Lockey ( MNCN )
.

, L. Lockey ( MNCN ) [data from original description, exact label data not recorded when the types were re-examined]
